A.name: The Scouring of the Shire Rules 1
A.printname: The Scouring of the Shire Rules 1
A.text:
Welcome to The Scouring of the Shire, an unofficial fan Saga Expansion, developed by A Long-extended Party (ALeP).
Component Overview
The Scouring of the Shire Saga Expansion includes 69 cards, consisting of:
 • 1 Rules Card • 56 Encounter Cards  • 1 Hero Card • 5 Quest Cards  • 4 Boon Cards • 1 Campaign Card  • 1 Contract Card
Expansion Symbol
The cards in The Scouring of the Shire Saga Expansion can be identified by this symbol before each card’s collector number.
Sharkey Deck
The Sharkey deck is a separate deck that represents the dangerous powers of Sharkey. To create the Sharkey deck, take each treachery card with the Sharkey trait from the encounter deck and shuffle them together. This is the Sharkey deck.

B.name: The Scouring of the Shire Rules 1
B.printname: The Scouring of the Shire Rules 1

b0d6c658-9687-45db-a7aa-daa84045af1e.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: The Scouring of the Shire Rules 2
A.printname: The Scouring of the Shire Rules 2
A.text:
Special Saga Rules
When playing The Scouring of the Shire, follow the “New Staging Rules” found on page 3 of The Black Riders Saga expansion rulebook. When setting up The Scouring of the Shire, the first player takes control of the [fellowship] Frodo Baggins included in this expansion. This version of [fellowship] Frodo Baggins can only be used while playing The Scouring of the Shire and cannot be used in any other quests. Players cannot use any other version(s) of Frodo Baggins or cards with the title “Saruman” when playing this quest.
Campaign Mode
New campaign and boon cards are included in The Scouring of the Shire. These cards allow the players to play The Scouring of the Shire as part of The Lord of the Rings campaign. It should be played after Mount Doom, from The Mountain of Fire Saga Expansion.
The complete rules for campaign mode can be found in The Black Riders Saga Expansion, which is required to play campaign mode.
Campaign Rewards
The Scouring of the Shire includes 1 contract card, Into the West, which cannot be used until the players have earned it while playing campaign mode. Once earned, this card may be used by the players who earned it when playing any quest (not just Saga quests).

B.name: The Scouring of the Shire Rules 2
B.printname: The Scouring of the Shire Rules 2

81c459d2-c910-4910-8e88-ef82e396fd28.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Many Partings
A.text: Setup: Create the Sharkey deck (see insert). Set Saruman, Brandywine Gate, Three-Farthing Stone, and each encounter side quest aside, out of play. Shuffle the encounter deck.

B.name: Many Partings
B.text:
Action: Exhaust a non-[fellowship] hero and discard a resource token from its pool. Then, add 2 resources to the set-aside Saruman.
At the end of the planning phase, advance to the next quest stage.

1082cffb-80b2-465c-aa6a-db97892cefd6.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Escorted "Prisoners"
A.text: When Revealed: Make Brandywine Gate the active location and add Three-Farthing Stone to the staging area.

B.name: Escorted "Prisoners"
B.text:
This stage cannot have more than 12 progress tokens on it.
Forced: At the end of the quest phase, if no progress was placed here as a result of questing successfully, the first player raises their threat by 3. If more than 3 progress was placed, each player engaged with 2 or more Shirriff enemies may discard 1 of them.
The players cannot advance while Three-Farthing Stone is in play.

14526e30-93de-43a6-8d4e-549c5e36a559.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Raise the Shire
A.text: When Revealed: Randomly select 3 of the set aside non-Doom side quests and put them into play (4 side quests instead if there are 3 or 4 players).

B.name: Raise the Shire
B.text:
Forced: After a side quest is defeated, search the encounter deck for a Shirriff enemy and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.
Forced: At the end of the round, place 1 resource token here and raise each player’s threat by the total number of resource tokens here. Then, the players may choose to advance to the next quest stage.

26688789-8f0f-4d50-9317-2d3f290dadd8.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: The Battle of Bywater
A.text: When Revealed: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Remove each Shirriff enemy in play and in the encounter deck from the game. The first player searches the encounter deck and victory display for 1 copy of Gang of Ruffians and engages it. Then, each player not engaged with a Ruffian enemy searches the encounter deck for a Ruffian enemy and engages it. Shuffle the encounter deck. Discard cards from the encounter deck until X enemies are discarded, and add those enemies to the staging area. X is the number of encounter side quests in play. Then, remove those side quests from the game.

B.name: The Battle of Bywater
B.text:
While any Ruffian enemy in play has any remaining hit points, all Ruffian enemies gain indestructible.
If there are no enemies in play, advance to the next quest stage.

a7385c0f-d040-4e15-8b39-dbf1195ba256.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: The Very Last Stroke
A.text: When Revealed: If it is the combat phase, end the phase. Add Saruman and Gríma’s Choice to the staging area.

B.name: The Very Last Stroke
B.text:
X is 6[pp]. This stage cannot have more progress than the number of resource tokens on Saruman.
Action: Exhaust a hero and discard 1 resource token from its pool to add 1 resource to Saruman.
This stage cannot be defeated while Saruman is in play. When this stage is defeated, the players win the game.

5bd94596-d7ab-4c51-95c2-a7f35241fba5.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Frodo Baggins
A.text:
The first player gains control of Frodo Baggins.
Response: After Frodo Baggins is declared as a defender, spend 1 [fellowship] resource to reduce your threat by the attacking enemy’s [threat]. Until the end of the round, that enemy cannot take damage.
If Frodo Baggins leaves play, the players lose the game.

788cdbe8-2142-4216-a8e4-d4172d0aafe2.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Saruman
A.text:
Immune to player card effects. Cannot be engaged. Sharkey card effects cannot be cancelled.
Forced: At the end of the staging step, add 1[pp] resource tokens to Saruman and reveal the top card of the Sharkey deck. Then, put the revealed card on the bottom of the Sharkey deck.

ae5664f2-0b5d-4c06-adeb-1abaecf656f8.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Brandywine Gate
A.text:
Immune to player card effects.
Forced: After Brandywine Gate is explored, each player searches the encounter deck for a Feather-capped Shirriff and engages it. Shuffle the encounter deck.

5b43020b-eb9b-4e60-8ad4-f738e4096aa7.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Three-Farthing Stone
A.text:
X is 3[pp]. Immune to player card effects. The players cannot travel here unless there are 12 progress tokens on Escorted “Prisoners”.
Response: After Three-Farthing Stone leaves play as an explored location, each player reduces their threat by 3.

78f85ede-3286-47fb-9c37-4e1b551d1607.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Hidden Blade
A.text: When Revealed: Saruman makes an immediate attack against each player in turn order. Allies cannot defend against Saruman.

46790c5b-3084-4cd2-9f91-58b0958820ac.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: One Ill Turn
A.text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted character. Until the end of the round, characters cannot be healed.

91ca4326-7e70-4b9d-8b64-ff9dbeea428f.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Voice of Saruman
A.text: When Revealed: Randomly select 1 ally controlled by each player, if able. Each player deals X damage to one of their heroes, where X is their chosen ally’s [attack], then discards that ally. If a player controls no allies, that player instead discards all attachments from the hero they control with the most attachments.

28bc3fcb-51df-4112-992e-cdfdc414ef74.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Curse Upon the Shire
A.text: When Revealed: Each player must choose: either raise your threat by 1 for each ally you control, or discard 2 allies you control.

63a273e8-c158-4e52-821d-d9ad6453415d.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: To the Road Again, Worm!
A.text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a location is discarded and add that location to the staging area. Deal X damage among characters in play. X is twice the number of locations in play (3 times the number of locations in play if there are 3 or more players).

4a2ed8ba-e842-4114-b759-25a3936cc16a.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Grima's Choice
A.text:
X is 3[pp]. This stage cannot be chosen as the current quest while The Very Last Stroke has remaining quest points.
Forced: When this stage is defeated, discard Saruman from play.

b868a16c-b732-437d-8b7c-ced670a5c7e7.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Rouse the Cottons
A.text:
While Rouse the Cottons is the current quest, allies cannot commit to the quest.
Forced: When this quest is defeated, flip this card over and reveal it.

B.name: Roused Hobbits
B.text:
While attached, counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Attached card loses indestructible and the enemy card type and gains the ally card type with [willpower] equal to its [threat]. If either attached card or Roused Hobbits would leave play, remove both cards from the game.”
When Revealed: Choose 1 player to take control of a Shirriff enemy engaged with them and attach Roused Hobbits to it (if there are no engaged Shirriff enemies, remove Roused Hobbits from the game).

cbb34cfa-d4ef-4a3b-8f8e-b8eeb956e043.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Awake! Fire, Foes! Awake!
A.text:
Encounter Action: Engage a Ruffian enemy in the encounter discard pile. Any player may trigger this effect.
Response: After the first player destroys an enemy, place 2 progress here.
Forced: When this quest is defeated, flip this card over and reveal it.

B.name: Roused Hobbits
B.text:
While attached, counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Attached card loses indestructible and the enemy card type and gains the ally card type with [willpower] equal to its [threat]. If either attached card or Roused Hobbits would leave play, remove both cards from the game.”
When Revealed: Choose 1 player to take control of a Shirriff enemy engaged with them and attach Roused Hobbits to it (if there are no engaged Shirriff enemies, remove Roused Hobbits from the game).

a7748571-4b35-43b4-a113-2928d0134106.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Set up Barriers
A.text:
Players cannot draw cards.
Action: Spend 1[pp] resources as a group to place 3 progress on Set up Barriers.
Forced: When this quest is completed, the first player discards all resources from each hero they control. Then, flip this card over and reveal it.

B.name: Roused Hobbits
B.text:
While attached, counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Attached card loses indestructible and the enemy card type and gains the ally card type with [willpower] equal to its [threat]. If either attached card or Roused Hobbits would leave play, remove both cards from the game.”
When Revealed: Choose 1 player to take control of a Shirriff enemy engaged with them and attach Roused Hobbits to it (if there are no engaged Shirriff enemies, remove Roused Hobbits from the game).

e041ca9b-92de-4a42-805a-2bca98a70595.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Muster the Tooks
A.text:
X is 4[pp]. While Muster the Tooks is the current quest, heroes cannot commit to the quest.
Forced: When this quest is defeated, flip this card over and reveal it.

B.name: Roused Hobbits
B.text:
While attached, counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Attached card loses indestructible and the enemy card type and gains the ally card type with [willpower] equal to its [threat]. If either attached card or Roused Hobbits would leave play, remove both cards from the game.”
When Revealed: Choose 1 player to take control of a Shirriff enemy engaged with them and attach Roused Hobbits to it (if there are no engaged Shirriff enemies, remove Roused Hobbits from the game).

fb8c81b3-a877-40f4-bab2-4fb6eb32a935.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Ambush Sharkey's Men
A.text:
Forced: After a Gang of Ruffians is defeated, flip this card over and reveal it.
Forced: At the end of the quest phase, if no progress was placed on Ambush Sharkey’s Men this round, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Ruffian enemy and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

B.name: Roused Hobbits
B.text:
While attached, counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Attached card loses indestructible and the enemy card type and gains the ally card type with [willpower] equal to its [threat]. If either attached card or Roused Hobbits would leave play, remove both cards from the game.”
When Revealed: Choose 1 player to take control of a Shirriff enemy engaged with them and attach Roused Hobbits to it (if there are no engaged Shirriff enemies, remove Roused Hobbits from the game).

f7eab629-9635-4678-b100-a71bfe09ce58.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Find the Gaffer
A.text:
Travel Action: Exhaust a hero you control to place 2 progress on Find the Gaffer. You cannot declare defenders or attackers this round. Any player may trigger this effect.
Forced: When this quest is defeated, flip this card over and reveal it.

B.name: Roused Hobbits
B.text:
While attached, counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Attached card loses indestructible and the enemy card type and gains the ally card type with [willpower] equal to its [threat]. If either attached card or Roused Hobbits would leave play, remove both cards from the game.”
When Revealed: Choose 1 player to take control of a Shirriff enemy engaged with them and attach Roused Hobbits to it (if there are no engaged Shirriff enemies, remove Roused Hobbits from the game).

784f7276-d8fb-4646-a09c-49b5152c1b6a.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Watch the East Road
A.text:
Cannot be chosen as the active quest. X is 1 plus 1[pp].
Response: At the beginning of the staging step, place any number of progress here and reveal an equal number of encounter cards.
Forced: When this quest is defeated, flip this card over and reveal it.

B.name: Roused Hobbits
B.text:
While attached, counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Attached card loses indestructible and the enemy card type and gains the ally card type with [willpower] equal to its [threat]. If either attached card or Roused Hobbits would leave play, remove both cards from the game.”
When Revealed: Choose 1 player to take control of a Shirriff enemy engaged with them and attach Roused Hobbits to it (if there are no engaged Shirriff enemies, remove Roused Hobbits from the game).

9e1974e2-7d7d-4d33-aa30-4544f8e95201.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Feather-capped Shirriff
A.text:
Damage dealt by Feather-capped Shirriff to your characters is instead assigned as an increase to your threat.
While the engaged player’s threat is higher than Feather-capped Shirriff’s engagement cost, Feather-capped Shirriff gets +1 [attack].

1038d1c2-f840-4f03-910e-8ae5fa1702be.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Thieving Ruffian
A.text: Forced: When Thieving Ruffian attacks you, raise your threat by 1 for each attachment on the defending character.

06e2aa7c-8c51-401a-b32a-c49905dae803.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Highway Robber
A.text: Forced: When Highway Robber attacks you, either discard 1 resource from a hero you control or Highway Robber gets +2 [attack] for this attack.

bcc1307b-0d31-46aa-9a82-fc24212c9261.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Gang of Ruffians
A.text:
Response: When Gang of Ruffians would deal damage during an attack, instead distribute that damage among characters controlled by the defending player.
Forced: After Gang of Ruffians attacks, if the attack destroyed at least 1 of your characters, discard 1 card at random from your hand and raise your threat by 1.

4098a223-70ff-42a9-bdee-0e40309c2449.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: The Lockholes
A.text:
When Revealed: Remove all attachments and discard all tokens from the highest cost ally you control and attach it facedown under The Lockholes.
Forced: After The Lockholes is explored, return the attached ally to its owner’s control, faceup and ready.

886866bb-62b8-439e-a553-956c3ed44ad2.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: East Road
A.text: When Revealed: Either raise your threat by 2 or East Road gains surge.

1e9a51ae-ea87-467f-a2da-f4534de12fce.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Shirriff House
A.text:
Forced: After Shirriff House becomes the active location, exhaust each character with 2 or more printed [attack].
Forced: After Shirriff House leaves play, the first player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Shirriff enemy and engage it, if able. Shuffle the encounter deck.

fc2c52f8-38fa-43c3-baf4-1b648a11067d.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Hobbiton Road
A.text: Forced: After Hobbiton Road leaves play, put a Ruffian enemy in the discard pile into play engaged with a player.
A.shadow: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to the defending character or raise your threat by 1.

0181a050-b9e1-4606-b249-e5d5df00efa5.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Brick Building
A.text: While Brick Building is in the staging area, characters cannot be healed.
A.shadow: Shadow: Deal 2 damage to the defending character or raise your threat by 2.

448bffce-a1d8-454c-8a56-e5c0ce243df0.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Wooden Shed
A.text: While Wooden Shed is in the staging area, players cannot reduce their threat by more than 1 each round.
A.shadow: Shadow: Either raise your threat by 1 or exhaust a character you control.

9ddf2571-bc5d-447b-a576-75ad90caf31e.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Once Beloved Place
A.text: When Revealed: Each location gets +1 [threat] until the end of the round. If there are fewer than 1[pp] locations in the staging area, discard cards from the encounter deck until a location is discarded and add it to the staging area.

58e05f2f-a0ce-46a9-a959-21d4daa5cb26.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Against the Rules
A.text: When Revealed: Exhaust each character with 3 or more printed [attack]. Each player that exhausted no characters by this effect must choose and exhaust 1 character they control.
A.shadow: Shadow: If your threat is higher than the attacking enemy’s engagement cost, the attacking enemy gets +2 [attack]. Otherwise, raise your threat by 2.

bcd65fe2-d5a0-4802-9127-9e14cb26e249.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Take Him, Lads!
A.text: When Revealed: Raise each player’s threat by 4. Then, each player discards an ally they control and reduces their threat by X, where X is the printed cost of their discarded ally.
A.shadow: Shadow: If your threat is higher than the attacking enemy’s engagement cost, the attacking enemy gets +2 [attack]. Otherwise, raise your threat by 2.

8e14024f-85af-4c07-af88-7b7cd0489f2f.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Sharkey's Men
A.text: When Revealed: Each enemy in play gets +1 [attack] until the end of the round. If there are fewer than 1[pp] Ruffian enemies in play, discard cards from the encounter deck until a Ruffian enemy is discarded and add it to the staging area.
A.shadow: Shadow: If the attacking enemy is a Ruffian, it makes an additional attack. The defending player may discard an ally they control to cancel this effect.

551cafa3-d52a-4710-bc5f-b722b7ef7165.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: The Scouring of the Shire
A.text:
You are playing Campaign Mode.
Setup: Each player may change heroes they control without incurring the +1 threat penalty. The players have earned the boon cards Star-like Gem, Bright Mail, Scatha’s Horn, and Heightened Stature. Each player chooses one and adds it to their hand. If any of these boon cards remain unchosen, one player may choose one of them and shuffle it into their deck. Remove any unchosen cards from the game. Remove Gwaihir and all burdens from the campaign pool. Attach Grievous Wound from The Road Darkens to Frodo Baggins.

B.name: The Scouring of the Shire
B.text: Resolution: Each player has earned the Into the West contract card and may now use it in their decks.

de8c3087-3a5d-424c-b137-fb548beb659e.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Star-like Gem
A.text:
Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gets +1 [willpower].
If attached hero is a Hobbit, it does not exhaust to quest.

f894c32c-5dfa-45f9-a5a3-122f3c171b89.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Bright Mail
A.text:
Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gets +1 [defense] (+2 [defense] instead if attached hero is a Hobbit).

ec138f38-054b-4d34-80f6-bd058c5483e7.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Scatha's Horn
A.text:
Attach to a hero.
Action: Exhaust Scatha’s Horn to choose an attacking enemy. Until the end of the phase, that enemy gets −1 [attack] (−2 [attack] instead if the defending character is a Hobbit hero).

c7ee9728-b2c4-4e98-8fc7-9d469161a547.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Heightened Stature
A.text:
Attach to a hero.
Attached hero gains +2 hit points (+3 hit points instead if attached hero is a Hobbit).
Action: Exhaust Heightened Stature to heal 1 damage from attached hero.

aaea207b-e0af-4865-89c9-16985543ef9a.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire

A.name: Into the West
A.text:
You cannot use this contract unless you have destroyed The One Ring and won The Scouring of the Shire in campaign mode.
Your deck must contain an equal number of cards with a printed cost of 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5.
Setup: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for an ally with a printed cost of 3 or less and put it into play. Shuffle your deck and flip this card over.

B.name: Into the West
B.text:
Into the West is immune to the effects of other cards and cannot leave your control or leave play. Allies you play from your hand cannot have their cost reduced by more than 2.
Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, attach Into the West to an ally you control, if able.
Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, distribute X resources among heroes you control, where X is the attached card’s printed cost. Remove the attached card from the game and draw 1 card.

58d50ea3-ddb5-401d-9be0-58ddceac7112.cardpackname: ALeP - The Scouring of the Shire
